dict.acceptation: 价钱，代价；花费，费用；牺牲；[用复数][法律]诉讼费；
付出代价；估价；使丧失；使付出努力；

sent.orig: Good City (COST) to report first-quarter net income the same period last year.
sent.trans: 好市多(COST)报告第一财季净收益与去年同期基本持平。

sent.orig: The paper expatiated the COST model method and arithmetic, and how to confirm the parameters.
sent.trans: 本文详细阐述了COST模型的理论及其算法，模型参数的确定及其获取途径。

sent.orig: Based on the Poisson arrival model, a new cache policy, Least Normalized Cost (LNC), is proposed.
sent.trans: 在泊松到达模型的基础上，提出一种新的缓存策略——最少正规化代价替换算法(leastnormalized-cost,简称LNC)。

sent.orig: The author thinks that crime cost is consist of material cost, non-material cost and penalty cost.
sent.trans: 笔者认为，犯罪成本由物质性成本、物质性成本及惩罚性成本构成。

sent.orig: The proposed transmission pricing method divides transmission cost into fixed cost, variable cost and additional cost.
sent.trans: 提出了一种新的输电定价方法，将输电费用成本组成分成固定成本、变动成本和附加成本。
